name: Project Fadeout
description:
Been trying to keep a tradition of uploading an alpha for people to play every month since development started
I missed a couple months but, here is Alpha 5.

The game is super early in development.
There isnt much to do besides explore, and evade/kill the snake thugs

• Supports XInput controllers (Xbox or PS4 with proper driver etc)
• Press ESC, Start Button, or P key to view controls and open the menu for options

WASD - move Mouse - look/aim L-click - shoot L-shift - sprint L-Ctrl - crouch Space - jump 1,2,3,4 - switch weapons TAB - cycle weapons (currently buggy) Q & E Drop/Pickup - Interact with Doors/Buttons

https://twitter.com/Weston_Mitchell

Follow me on twitter for more updates <3
